title: Can't see my runes in lobby or before
body: Can see my spell page and item sets but nothing happens when I press on runes. In champ select pressing on the runes only brings up a frame and nothing else

replies.body: Our techs are still looking into figuring out exactly what causes that weird visual bug as well as how to squash it once and for all. For now, try updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as well and double checking your port forward and DNS settings using the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a resource. Be sure to let me know if this helps at all!
This is a known bug was already reported many times. Riot should know about the bug and will probably be fixed in the next patch.
